translation.en: ♪ Action Pack ♪
♪ Here we go ♪
♪ We always shine so bright We'll help you make it right ♪
translation.it: Sempre brillanti Sistemiamo tutto in un lampo

translation.en: ♪ Heart, smarts, and mega might ♪
♪ Ready for action… ♪
Watts!
♪ Bring on adventure… ♪
Clay!
-♪ Yeah, we got your back… ♪ -Wren!
♪ Nothing stands in our way… ♪
Treena!
♪ We are the Action Pack! ♪
All right!
-[Watts] Got it! -Plant-tastic! [laughs]
Ha! Come on, let's go!
[Clay laughs] Perfect.
Plasma-powered prettying.
I'll light the menorah. [grunts]
Mission accomplished!
-Yeah! -All right!
Feliz Navidad! [giggles]
Look at all these presents!
Nothing's better than a grizzly-bear-big stack of presents with your name on 'em.
translation.it: Non c'è niente di meglio di una pila di regali alta come un grizzly.

translation.en: Hot Sparks!
Is this one for me?
Yeppers.
I had so much fun making Hanukkah presents when we celebrated with you, Watts,
translation.it: Mi è piaciuto così tanto fare i regali per Hanukkah

translation.en: that I made Christmas presents for everyone too.
translation.it: che ve ne ho fatti anche per Natale.

translation.en: Ooh, holidays make me hamster-hedgehog-hummingbird happy!
translation.it: Oh, le feste mi rendono felice come un criceto sulla ruota!

translation.en: Can I open it?
Nuh-uh, Watts. It's Hope Springs' Christmas tradition
translation.it: No, Volt. La tradizione natalizia di Hope Springs

translation.en: that you don't open gifts until the gift exchange at the tree lighting ceremony.
translation.it: prevede che si aprano i regali alla cerimonia di accensione dell'albero.

translation.en: Right. Presents happen after I help light up the tree! [grunts]
translation.it: Giusto. I regali si aprono dopo che avrò acceso l'albero!

translation.en: Zip, zip, zip!
-[Mr. Ernesto] Watts! -The crowd cheers! They chant my name!
translation.it: - Volt! - La folla esulta! Grida il mio nome!

translation.en: -That's me. Thank you. -[Mr. Ernesto] Watts!
-Watts! -Oh. Yes?
Light the tree, not the teacher.
Oops! -Sorry, Mr. Ernesto. [laughs awkwardly] -[Plunky barks]
[gasps] Wow, Action Pack! Mission Decorate The Action Academy is complete.
translation.it: Wow, Action Pack! Missione Decora L'Accademia Action, completata.

translation.en: Hoodies down, team.
You kids are clear to go to the tree lighting. Grab your gifts for the exchange,
translation.it: Andare pure all'illuminazione dell'albero. Portate i regali.

translation.en: and I'll be there as soon as my cookies are done.
translation.it: Io sarò lì appena saranno pronti i biscotti.

translation.en: -Yeah! -Woo-hoo!
[carol singers] ♪ Dashing through the snow In a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.it: Sfrecciamo nella neve Su una slitta trainata da un cavallo

translation.en: ♪ O'er the fields we go Laughing all the way… ♪
translation.it: Attraversiamo i campi Ridendo tutto il tempo…

translation.en: Everybody loves winter!
♪ Making spirits bright What fun it is to… ♪
It's too early for Christmas music!
translation.it: È troppo presto per la musica di Natale!

translation.en: Oh, Mr. Grumpman, it's Christmas Eve!
Oh, fiddlesticks!
[singers] ♪ Oh, what fun it is to ride… ♪
[Teddy] Ah, Matthew.
translation.it: Oh, Matthew. Come mio primo giocattolo,

translation.en: As my first toy, you understand that being the child of the Von Taker toy tycoons
translation.it: Oh, Matthew. Come mio primo giocattolo, sai che in quanto figlio del magnate dei giocattoli Von Ruber

translation.en: means I get every toy made in Hope Springs.
translation.it: ho tutti i giocattoli fatti a Hope Springs.

translation.en: But I, Teddy Von Taker, need more toys! Toys not built in Hope Springs.
translation.it: Ma io, Rudy Von Ruber, ne voglio altri, non fatti a Hope Springs.

translation.en: And to take them, I need more power.
translation.it: E per prenderli, mi serve più potere.

translation.en: That's where my Christmas Cheer-Taker comes in.
translation.it: Perciò ho creato il mio Ruba-Allegria Natalizia.

translation.en: Once I get the Christmas cheer, I'll be ready for Santa tonight.
translation.it: Rubata l'allegria natalizia, sarò pronto per Babbo Natale.

translation.en: -It's a flurry of fun! -[giggling]
There's a kid with Christmas cheer! Shall we, Matthew?
translation.it: Bambini con allegria natalizia! Andiamo, Matthew?

translation.en: Time to take the cheer away.
Yeah! Winter!
-Whatever. -Whatever.
-Whatever. -Eh, it's just snow.
[Teddy laughs] It's working! More cheer for me, less cheer for everyone else!
translation.it: Funziona! Più allegria per me, meno per tutti gli altri!

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells… ♪
I'll be taking your cheer too. [sinister laugh]
♪ Oh, what fun it is to ride In a one-horse open sleigh, hey! ♪
translation.it: Quant'è divertente andare su una slitta trainata da un cavallo, ehi!

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells ♪
-Oh, hot dog. -Let's go.
[Phil] I don't really feel like singin'.
Finally! I can enjoy Christmas in peace.
translation.it: Finalmente! Posso godermi il Natale in pace.

translation.en: Why isn't my Cheer-Taker working?
You think you're just gonna suck out all the cheer to power up that battery thingamajig?
translation.it: Pensi di risucchiare la mia allegria con quell'aggeggio a batterie?

translation.en: Well, I don't have any cheer to take! [laughs]
translation.it: Beh, io di allegria non ne ho!

translation.en: I say the joke is on you, sir.
You have a little cheer in there after all.
translation.it: Un po' di allegria ce l'ha, dopotutto.

translation.en: Oh, fiddlesticks.
More cheer, more power for me! [laughs]
translation.it: Più allegria, più potere per me!

translation.en: And then, one Christmas, I got an art kit, and it had paint and glitter and--
translation.it: E poi un Natale ho ricevuto un kit con tempere, brillantini e…

translation.en: Why are they leaving? This Christmas party isn't looking like a party at all.
translation.it: - Perché se ne vanno? - Che festa di Natale poco festosa.

translation.en: -Let's see what's going on. -[Wren grunts]
-What's wrong, Cold Snap? -I don't feel like celebrating. Goodbye.
translation.it: - Che succede, Jay-Gelotto? - Non mi va di festeggiare. Ciao.

translation.en: What? I thought Cold Snap would love Christmas.
translation.it: Cosa? Pensavo che avrebbe adorato il Natale.

translation.en: Maybe he celebrates something else?
Well, Hanukkah's all about being with your family, and kindness, and giving too.
translation.it: Beh, anche ad Hanukkah si sta in famiglia, si è gentili e si dona agli altri.

translation.en: All of those things make me happy, so I don't think that's it.
translation.it: E sono cose mi rendono felice, quindi non credo sia quello.

translation.en: Something strange is going on here.
This place should be bubbling with Christmas cheer.
Did someone say Christmas cheer? Teddy Von Taker?!
translation.it: - Qualcuno ha detto allegria natalizia? - Rudy Von Ruber?

translation.en: Why, hello, Action Pack. You have just the cheer I'm here to take, take, take.
translation.it: Ciao, Action Pack. La vostra allegria fa proprio al caso mio.

translation.en: Wonderful! The Toy Tycoon Multi-Purpose Gauntlet is quite handy.
translation.it: Meraviglioso! Il Guanto Multiuso del Magnate dei Giocattoli è utilissimo.

translation.en: Take our cheer? What does he mean?
translation.it: Vuole la nostra allegria? In che senso?

translation.en: I don't know. But we better find out.
translation.it: Non lo so. Ma sarà meglio scoprirlo.

translation.en: Action Pack, circle up, hoodies up, and…
translation.it: Action Pack, in cerchio, su i cappucci e…

translation.en: [all] Take action!
♪ Action Pack ♪
♪ Here we go ♪
Treena, mighty flowers and plant powers!
translation.it: Gemma, maestosi poteri di piante e fiori!

translation.en: Clay, Plasma Power and Invinci-ball!
Wren, changing up with animal powers. Roar!
translation.it: Diana, trasformazione in potenti animali! Roar!

translation.en: Watts, supercharged electric zaps!
I'm tired of waiting, Action Pack!
translation.it: Sono stanco di aspettare, Action Pack!

translation.en: -Whoa! -So loud!
[laughs] Oh, pardon me. Microphone off. I'm just here to take your cheer.
translation.it: Oh, scusate. Microfono, spento. Voglio solo rubarvi l'allegria.

translation.en: Watch out! Action On! Invinci-ball!
Butterfly Wings!
Oh, zap!
Huh? It's not working!
Hey! Taking people's Christmas cheer is not nice!
translation.it: Ehi! Non è bello rubare l'allegria natalizia!

translation.en: Being all cheery, happy, smiley, and full of feel-good feels is what Christmas is all abou--
translation.it: Il Natale è essere allegri, felici, sorridenti e pieni di buoni sentim…

translation.en: Wren!
Don't worry. I'll stop this. [grunts]
Electric Blast!
[chuckles] Fully charged and ready to take, take, take for phase two.
translation.it: Carico al massimo e pronto per la fase due.

translation.en: Wren! -[Wren groans] -Oh no!
I won't even need the cheer from the rest of the Action Pack. Ready, Matthew?
translation.it: Non mi servirà neanche l'allegria degli altri. Pronto, Matthew?

translation.en: Then let's go. [laughs]
-Are you okay? -How do you feel?
[Wren] I'm okay.
I just feel… nothing.
[gasps] Oh no! He actually took her Christmas cheer.
translation.it: Oh, no! Le ha rubato l'allegria natalizia.

translation.en: Why would Teddy do that?
Well, Mr. Ernesto did teach us that Christmas cheer is really powerful.
translation.it: Il signor Ernesto ci ha insegnato che l'allegria natalizia è potente.

translation.en: Oh, zap! With all Wren's cheer, Teddy Von Taker will be mega-powered!
translation.it: Fulminacci! Con l'allegria di Diana, Rudy Von Ruber sarà super potente!

translation.en: I think we need a plan of action. Treena?
You got it. Our mission is to save Christmas.
translation.it: Ci penso io. La missione è salvare il Natale.

translation.en: We have to stop Teddy Von Taker
from doing whatever he plans to do with that cheer power.
translation.it: di fare ciò che vuole fare col potere dell'allegria.

translation.en: Then we need to figure out how to get the cheer out of that battery
translation.it: Poi dobbiamo capire come riportare l'allegria

translation.en: and back into the people.
[Watts] Then I'll light the tree!
[Wren] That is a plan.
Action On!
Action On. I guess.
-[Teddy groans] -Hold it right there, Teddy Von Taker.
Bye!
Give that cheer back, or I'll… [gasps] Hot Sparks!
Is that really an UltraFly Zoom Board 2.0? Can I try it?
translation.it: È una Tavola Ultra-Volo Zoom 2.0? Posso provarla?

translation.en: Actually, it's the 3.0 version with advanced agility. [laughs]
translation.it: In realtà, è la versione 3.0 con agilità avanzata.

translation.en: Bye!
[grunts] What?
-Gotcha! -Yeah!
Release the penguins!
Watch out!
Distract those heroes by, uh…
[gasps] Destroying that Christmas tree!
Don't hurt the tree!
Petal-copter Power!
If they destroy the tree, then I won't be able to light it.
translation.it: Se distruggono l'albero, non potrò accenderlo.

translation.en: Penguins. Meh.
Wren! Invinci-ball!
Huh. Invinci-ball. How unexpected.
Petal Flurry!
This tree is under our protection.
Not the presents! [grunts]
Electric Trail!
Oh, oh, oh, yeah!
-[Clay] All right! -Way to grow, buds.
-[Treena] No! -Invinci-ball!
-What do we do? -There are too many penguins!
translation.it: - Che facciamo? - I pinguini sono troppi!

translation.en: Do you hear that?
-Huh? -What is that?
[Santa] Penguins!
You're on my naughty list.
Super Santa and Striker are here to save Christmas!
translation.it: Super Babbo e Striker sono qui per salvare il Natale!

translation.en: -Incredible! -Santa Claus is a s-superhero?
translation.it: - Incredibile! - Babbo Natale è un supereroe?

translation.en: Santa. That's nice.
Action Pack, I brought cookies!
translation.it: Action Pack, ho portato i biscotti!

translation.en: [gasps] Santa?!
I know who you are.
Ernesto Action, top of the nice list for the past 27 years. [laughs]
translation.it: Ernesto Action, in cima alla lista dei buoni da 27 anni.

translation.en: -Meet my reindeer, Striker. -[Striker neighs]
translation.it: Lei è la mia renna, Striker.

translation.en: Action Pack, I was delivering presents
when I received a red and green alert on the naughty list
translation.it: quando la lista dei cattivi mi ha avvisato

translation.en: that Hope Springs' Christmas cheer was taken by Teddy Von Taker.
translation.it: che Rudy Von Ruber stava rubando l'allegria natalizia di Hope Springs.

translation.en: Well, I'm here to get that cheer back.
What do you think he's trying to do with the cheer, Santa?
Well, I… I don't know. You see, Christmas cheer is usually used for good,
translation.it: Non lo so. L'allegria natalizia si usa per fare del bene,

translation.en: helping others, spreading joy, giving.
translation.it: aiutare gli altri, diffondere gioia, donare.

translation.en: But the raw power of Christmas cheer can also be used for bad.
translation.it: Ma il suo potere può essere usato anche per fare del male.

translation.en: It could power all sorts of villain devices. I have to save Christmas!
translation.it: Può alimentare dei dispositivi malvagi. Devo salvare il Natale!

translation.en: Um, excuse me, Super Santa, sir. I mean, Mr. Claus.
translation.it: Scusa, Super Babbo, signore. Cioè, signor Natale.

translation.en: Your mission is our mission too. -And we'd love to help. -[giggles]
translation.it: - La tua missione è anche la nostra. - E vorremmo aiutarti.

translation.en: Oh, well, Santa always needs a few little helpers, that's for sure.
translation.it: Beh, a Babbo Natale servono sempre dei piccoli aiutanti.

translation.en: But first, we must get Wren -feeling like her cheerful self again. -Meh.
translation.it: Ma prima dobbiamo far sì che Diana torni allegra come sempre.

translation.en: And to fill her full of Christmas cheer, we'll need her presents.
translation.it: E per riempirla di allegria natalizia, ci servono i suoi regali.

translation.en: Presents! This one's for Wren! And that one!
translation.it: Regali! Questo è per Diana! E anche quello!

translation.en: Ho, ho! You misunderstood, Watts.
Getting presents is great,
but the quickest way to gain Christmas cheer is by giving.
translation.it: ma il modo più veloce per sentirsi allegri è farli.

translation.en: Wren, get the present you brought for Clay. Okay, if you say so.
translation.it: - Diana, prendi il tuo regalo per Argy. - Ok, se lo dici tu.

translation.en: For you, Clay.
"The Exciting Adventures of Clay." Wow, you made a comic for me?
translation.it: Le emozionanti avventure di Argy. Wow, mi hai disegnato un fumetto?

translation.en: It's my favorite present. Thanks, Wren!
translation.it: È il mio regalo preferito. Grazie, Diana!

translation.en: And one for Treena.
[gasps] A flower pot!
-I painted the flowers just for you. -[giggles]
translation.it: Ci ho dipinto sopra dei fiori per te.

translation.en: Thank you, Wren!
-And the last one is for Watts. -Yes, yes, yes!
translation.it: - E l'ultimo è per Volt. - Sì!

translation.en: Hot Sparks! You made a drawing of me with Crimson Cape?
translation.it: Sante Saette! Mi hai disegnato insieme a Crimson Cape?

translation.en: We look so cool! Can I get a hug, Wren?
translation.it: Siamo fichissimi! Posso avere un abbraccio, Diana?

translation.en: Abso-toucan-lutely!
-Group hug! -[Wren giggles]
Santa? [squeals]
Santa's here! Are ya ready to save Christmas? 'Cause I am!
translation.it: C'è Babbo Natale! Pronto a salvare il Natale? Io sì!

translation.en: Hiya, Striker. I want to hear all about being a reindeer.
translation.it: Ciao, Striker. Voglio sapere tutto sull'essere una renna.

translation.en: -[Striker neighs] -Uh-huh, yeah. Really?
Oh! Uh-huh? Wow! I didn't understand a word ya said,
translation.it: Wow! Non ho capito una parola

translation.en: 'cause I don't speak reindeer, but I love the way ya snort.
translation.it: perché non parlo la tua lingua, ma bel grugnito.

translation.en: -W-What? -Ah, Mr. Ernesto. Welcome back.
I'll need you to run Mission Control while we go to Teddy's hideout to wait.
translation.it: Dovrai stare al Controllo Missione mentre noi andiamo da Rudy.

translation.en: Me? Mission Control for you? The big guy in the red suit?!
translation.it: Io? Al Controllo Missione per lei? L'omone vestito di rosso?

translation.en: -I'd be honored, sir! Come on, Plunky! -[Plunky barks]
translation.it: È un onore, signore! Forza, Plunky!

translation.en: Action Pack, be smart, be safe, be superheroes!
translation.it: Action Pack, siate svegli, siate sicuri, siate supereroi!

translation.en: Action On!
For Hanukkah, we celebrate eight nights, and we get presents every night.
translation.it: Ad Hanukkah, festeggiamo otto sere e riceviamo doni ogni sera.

translation.en: Oh, that sounds amazing, Watts.
Lighting the way, you say. That reminds me of someone else.
translation.it: "Illuminate la via", eh? Mi ricordate qualcun altro.

translation.en: There he is!
Ah, see, Matthew? Everything is working out just according to--
translation.it: Visto, Matthew? Sta andando tutto secondo i…

translation.en: Teddy Von Taker!
Hello, Santa. Isn't it a bit early for you to be in Hope Springs?
translation.it: Ciao, Babbo Natale. Non sei un po' in anticipo?

translation.en: It is, but he was alerted because of what you did, and now we're here to stop you.
translation.it: Sì, ma ha saputo cos'hai fatto, e siamo qui per fermarti.

translation.en: I'm taking this cheer and returning it to the people of Hope Springs.
translation.it: Restituirò l'allegria ai cittadini di Hope Springs.

translation.en: Sure, sure.
But first, won't you join me for a snack?
translation.it: Ma prima non ti andrebbe uno spuntino?

translation.en: M-Milk and c-c-cookies?
-Milk and cookies! -[Treena] Santa! No!
translation.it: - Latte e biscotti… - Babbo Natale! No!

translation.en: -It's a trap! -[Watts] Don't do it!
-[Wren] Santa, stop! -[Santa] Milk and cookies!
translation.it: - Babbo Natale, fermati! - Latte e biscotti…

translation.en: The Invinci-ball is breaking!
Ah, we'll do it together, old sport.
-[Watts] A force field! -Leapin' lemurs!
translation.it: - Un campo di forza! - Per tutti i lemuri!

translation.en: -No! -We're trapped!
Huh? What happened?
Oh no. Milk and cookies!
-My only weakness. -[Striker snorts]
[Teddy] The Christmas cheer powering this force field
translation.it: L'allegria natalizia che alimenta il campo di forza

translation.en: is more powerful than even you, my ho-hoing chum, so you can't escape.
translation.it: è anche più potente di te, amico panciuto, perciò non puoi scappare.

translation.en: And now to take, take, take my prize!
translation.it: E ora ruberò il mio premio!

translation.en: Santa's cape! Everything I ever wanted to take is here.
translation.it: Il mantello di Babbo Natale! Tutto ciò che desidero è qui!

translation.en: Wow, I guess Teddy really likes capes. He knows. But how?
translation.it: - Wow, gli piacciono proprio i mantelli. - Lo sa. Ma come?

translation.en: Allow me to explain.
I have every toy Hope Springs has to offer.
translation.it: Ho tutti i giocattoli esistenti a Hope Springs,

translation.en: What I don't have is every toy from the North Pole, and I want them all!
translation.it: ma non ho i giocattoli del Polo Nord e li voglio tutti!

translation.en: I tried taking some last year. It was Christmas Eve.
translation.it: L'anno scorso ho provato a prenderli. Era la vigilia di Natale.

translation.en: I placed my spy in the Action Academy, where those heroes would get their gifts.
translation.it: Ho messo una spia all'Accademia Action, dove gli eroi avrebbero ricevuto i doni.

translation.en: That's when I saw that the cape was the bag,
translation.it: È stato allora che ho visto che il mantello è il sacco,

translation.en: and that the bag was a portal connected directly to the North Pole Workshop.
translation.it: e il sacco è un portale collegato all'officina al Polo Nord.

translation.en: Santa's Workshop, would you mind getting me
translation.it: Babb-officina, posso avere un peluche super morbido per Diana Reyes, per favore?

translation.en: a super snuggly snuggle bug for Wren Reyes, please? [laughs]
translation.it: posso avere un peluche super morbido per Diana Reyes, per favore?

translation.en: [Teddy] Any toy that the holder of the bag asked for would appear in the bag.
translation.it: Chi ha il sacco può richiedere qualsiasi giocattolo.

translation.en: I wasn't able to take it last Christmas
translation.it: L'anno scorso non ho potuto rubarlo

translation.en: because I wasn't powerful enough to trap Santa.
translation.it: perché non potevo intrappolare Babbo Natale.

translation.en: That's where the Christmas cheer came in. Now every North Pole toy will be mine!
translation.it: Perciò mi serviva l'allegria natalizia. I giocattoli del Polo Nord saranno miei!

translation.en: Attention, Santa's Workshop.
I'll take a toy car.
Yes! It worked! I'll take another car.
And another car, and another car,
and another!
Boy, he really likes cars.
I think we're going to need more help than that, Striker.
translation.it: Credo ci servirà più aiuto di così, Striker.

translation.en: I can help. Action On! Polar Bear!
translation.it: Ci penso io. In azione! Orso polare!

translation.en: Polar Bear!
Oh no! I think the Cheer-Taker messed with my animal powers.
translation.it: Oh, no! Credo che il Ruba-Allegria abbia danneggiato i miei poteri.

translation.en: Mr. Ernesto will be able to help us.
Mr. Ernesto, come in.
Treena, what's wrong? Is Santa okay? Can he hear me?
translation.it: Gemma, che succede? Babbo Natale sta bene? Mi sente?

translation.en: Yes, he can hear you. And no, we're not okay.
translation.it: Sì, ti sente. E no, non stiamo bene!

translation.en: We're trapped inside a Christmas cheer-powered force field.
translation.it: Siamo bloccati in un campo di forza di allegria.

translation.en: Oh no! I'm scanning the design through your insignia.
translation.it: Oh, no! Eseguo una scansione della struttura.

translation.en: And another car! And another!
Oh, got it! If it works the way I think it does,
the only way to deactivate the force field is to press the red button on the power dock.
translation.it: per disattivare il campo di forza va premuto il bottone rosso sulla console.

translation.en: Maybe I can reach it.
Plasma Putty Stretch!
[strains] It's too far. And I can't quite push it.
translation.it: È troppo lontano. Non riesco a premerlo.

translation.en: If I could just change into a tiny mouse, I could fit through.
translation.it: Se potessi trasformarmi in un topolino, passerei tra le sbarre!

translation.en: Action On! Tiny Mouse! [groans]
Wren, you are one of the best gift givers I have ever met.
translation.it: Diana, ho visto poche persone brave come te a fare regali.

translation.en: I bet if you think of your powers as a gift you can give to Hope Springs,
translation.it: Scommetto che se pensi ai tuoi poteri come a un dono per Hope Springs,

translation.en: you'll be able to do it. You're silly, Santa.
translation.it: - ce la farai. - Che sciocchino, Babbo Natale.

translation.en: It's not a gift. There's no way to put it in a pretty box and wrap it.
translation.it: Non è un dono. Non si mette in una scatola né si incarta.

translation.en: [chuckles] Gifts don't have to be things you can hold in your hands.
translation.it: I doni non sono per forza oggetti.

translation.en: Some of the best gifts are something you do for someone.
translation.it: Alcuni dei doni più belli sono qualcosa che fai per qualcuno.

translation.en: Okay.
Action On! Tiny Mouse!
Tiny Mouse!
A gift for Hope Springs.
Action On! Tiny Mouse!
Huh? [gasps] It worked!
-Plant-tastic! -Hot Sparks!
I'll shut off that battery before you can say duck-billed platypus!
translation.it: Spegnerò la batteria prima che possiate dire ornitorinco!

translation.en: Oh! Being itty-bitty is mega-biggie dangerous.
[squeals] Where did this bear come from? And I can't go big, or Teddy will see me.
translation.it: Quest'orso da dove viene? E non posso ingrandirmi, o Rudy mi vedrà.

translation.en: Attention, Santa's Workshop.
My dear Matthew has requested more bears. [laughs]
translation.it: Il mio caro Matthew vuole altri orsi.

translation.en: Bad car, bad car!
Good car, good car! [gasps]
-Yeah! -Great job, Wren!
Push, push, push!
[Teddy] You!
Action On! Sneaky Fox!
Action On! Cheetah? Action On! Anything?
translation.it: In azione! Ghepardo? In azione! Qualsiasi cosa?

translation.en: [yelps] My animal powers aren't working again! And I'm stuck as a mouse!
translation.it: I miei poteri non funzionano di nuovo! Sono bloccata così!

translation.en: Santa's Workshop!
I need something that will take this meddling rodent far away from that button.
translation.it: Mi serve qualcosa che allontani quel roditore dal pulsante.

translation.en: How about some Taker Tots?
translation.it: Perché non delle Rubette di Patate?

translation.en: [Taker Tots] Take, take, take, take. Take, take.
Wren! Look out! -[Taker Tots] Take. -Oh no!
-[Taker Tots] Take, take, take, take. -[Wren squeals]
-Take! -Take!
-[Wren screams] -[Taker Tot] Take!
Wren! A gift for Hope Springs!
translation.it: Diana! Un dono per Hope Springs!

translation.en: This is my gift for Hope Springs.
translation.it: Questo è il mio dono per Hope Springs.

translation.en: -Action On! -[Taker Tots] Take.
Polar Bear Arms!
I did it!
A gift for Hope Springs! A gift for Hope Springs!
They're going to be so happy and cheerful and have a very merry Christmas!
translation.it: Saranno felici e allegri e passeranno un buon Natale!

translation.en: Take!
Taker Tots, take them!
[Action Pack] Action On!
Invinci-ball!
Get the Taker Tots in here!
translation.it: Mandate qui le Rubette di Patate!

translation.en: Flower Power!
Take?
Home run!
-[Taker Tot] Take. -[Watts grunts]
-Take? -Slam dunk!
Just let--
I'll be taking that, and all the toys you took.
translation.it: Mi riprendo questo e i giocattoli che hai rubato.

translation.en: -Come along, toys. -No! Not my toys!
translation.it: - Venite, giocattoli! - No! I miei giocattoli!

translation.en: -[Taker Tot] Take. -Hey, I took those fair and square!
That one didn't listen to you, so it's mine. And you can't take it back.
translation.it: Quella non ti ha ascoltato, quindi è mia. E non puoi riprendertela.

translation.en: Taker Tot, take them.
-Take? -[Teddy] No, wait!
It's time to restore Christmas cheer.
translation.it: È ora di restituire l'allegria natalizia.

translation.en: Nothing like a quiet walk.
Wow, look at that.
-Oh! -Hot dog!
♪ Dashing through the snow In a one-horse open sleigh… ♪
translation.it: Sfrecciamo nella neve Su una slitta trainata…

translation.en: No caroling!
-♪ O'er the hills we go… ♪ -[Mr. Grumpman laughs]
Oh ho, they did it! The Action Pack and Santa returned the Christmas cheer!
translation.it: Ce l'hanno fatta! Hanno restituito l'allegria natalizia!

translation.en: Merry Christmas to you, Mr. Ernesto. And you too, Plunky.
translation.it: Buon Natale a te, signor Ernesto. E anche a te, Plunky.

translation.en: [carol singers] ♪ Oh, what fun it is To ride in a one-horse open sleigh, hey! ♪
translation.it: Quant'è divertente andare su una slitta trainata da un cavallo, ehi!

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
translation.it: Suonate, campanelle Non smettete mai di suonare

translation.en: ♪ Oh, what fun… ♪
Thank you for your help. You did a jolly good job.
But our mission isn't over yet. Yeah. We'd light up if it was.
translation.it: - Ma la missione non è finita. - Sì, non si sono accesi gli stemmi.

translation.en: Well, we only finished the first part of the mission to save Christmas.
translation.it: Beh, abbiamo solo iniziato a salvare il Natale.

translation.en: With all that hullabaloo, I'm behind on my gift deliveries.
translation.it: Con tutto quel macello, sono indietro con le consegne.

translation.en: [chuckles] Action Pack, would you like to help me deliver the gifts?
translation.it: Action Pack, volete aiutarmi a consegnare i regali?

translation.en: -Yes! -That would be awesome!
-I think I'd like that. -I love giving!
Mr. Ernesto, can you help us by mapping the fastest route?
translation.it: Signor Ernesto, puoi aiutarci calcolando il percorso più veloce?

translation.en: One step ahead of you. Plunky and I have already planned the perfect delivery route
translation.it: Già fatto. Io e Plunky abbiamo pianificato il percorso perfetto

translation.en: so you can get all the presents out on time.
translation.it: per consegnare tutti i regali in tempo.

translation.en: Excellent Mission Controlling, you two.
But it's not Christmas until we light the tree.
translation.it: Ma non è Natale finché non accendiamo l'albero.

translation.en: Hot Sparks! That's my cue!
-[Watts] Happy holidays! -[Wren] Feliz Navidad!
[all] Merry Christmas!
